text: "Falling in Love Again" is a single by New Zealand singer-songwriter Anika Moa. It features on her début album, Thinking Room. ==Chart performance== The single entered the New Zealand Singles Chart at number fifty, and peaked at number five. It spent a total of twenty-four weeks in the chart. It also spent one week in the Australian Singles Chart at number sixty-one. ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2002) !Position |- |align="left"|New Zealand (Recorded Music NZ) |align="center"|11 |} ==References== Category:Anika Moa songs Category:2002 singles Category:2001 songs Category:Atlantic Records singles
title: Falling in Love Again (Anika Moa song)
